tag_to_content.title: NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.p_0:
Our Mission
Transform the global landscapeby uniting talent and visions.
tag_to_content.p_1:
At NTT DOCOMO Ventures, we unite your vision with the NTT Group’s proven deployment expertise to create a better future. 
                        Together we can make a huge impact and  transform the global landscape.
tag_to_content.p_2:
Our Vision
With all the talents and enthusiasms necessary to change the world,we get together and unite at our dynamic global corporate venture capital.
tag_to_content.p_3:
The NTT Group transforms the global landscape with its preeminent technological skills and proven deployment capabilities.
                    Startups plant the budding trees of change with their innovations and talent, enabling them to freely conceptualize and execute decisively.
                    At NTT DOCOMO Ventures, we link your visionary concepts with the NTT Group’s decisive deployment expertise.
                    Our mission is to unite startups and the NTT Group - empowering our united talent and passion.
                    By joining together your ambitions and our aspirations, we will create a new driving force towards the future and making the world-changing impacts that we have never seen before.
                    With our dynamic global venture capital firm, we aspire to bring together all the talent and ambitions necessary to lead this global transformation and change the world for the better.
tag_to_content.p_5: We make business collaborations between startups and NTT group.

tag_to_content.title: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in Minto Inc., a Producer of Content for Social Media, Webtoon, Web3 and Other Platforms | NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.h1_0: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in Minto Inc., a Producer of Content for Social Media, Webtoon, Web3 and Other Platforms
tag_to_content.p_2: NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc. (Head Office: Minato-ku, Tokyo; President and CEO: Jun Yasumoto; hereinafter, “NDV”) is pleased to announce that, through a fund that it manages, it has invested in Minto Inc, (Head Office: Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Kazuhiro Mizuno; hereafter “Minto”), a company that produces manga and anime content for social media, Webtoon, Web3 and other platforms.
tag_to_content.p_3:
Minto works with creators active in the fields of intellectual property (IP) and social media to assist companies in their marketing efforts. With one of Japan’s largest networks of creators (more than 250), the company is able to undertake all aspects of the IP business, from planning to production and distribution.
　It is also involved in license management for companies and creators, as well as IP development through its own studio, opening a production studio specializing in webtoon in 2021. Currently, it is working on the global roll-out of IP originating from Japan.
tag_to_content.p_4: The DOCOMO Group is working to strengthen its content business in the fields of video and entertainment. In addition to developing services such as “dAnime Store” and “dBook,” it is also engaged in the development of new content utilizing the Metaverse, Web3, and other technologies. By taking this investment as an opportunity to strengthen cooperation with Minto, with its expertise in content development, we aim to create new value with the DOCOMO Group.
tag_to_content.p_5:
■Minto Inc. Profile
Name: Minto Inc.
Head Office: 6F the ARGYLE Aoyama, 2-14-4 Kita-Aoyama, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Representative: Kazuhiro Mizuno, Representative Director and CEO
Areas of Business　Content Solution Service, IP Production Service, Web3 Service
Website: https://minto-inc.jp/en/

tag_to_content.title: Team | NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.span_1: Managing Director
tag_to_content.p_1:
Managing Director
Takuya Takagi is an accomplished professional and currently serves as Senior Managing Director at NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc. With a strong background in telecommunications and technology, he leads venture capital investments and plays a crucial role in driving strategic growth. Takuya's expertise spans 5G, IoT, and corporate sustainability activities. He gained valuable insights and leadership skills through the prestigious MIT MBA program and earned a Sustainability Certificate from MIT, further enhancing his ability to drive sustainable innovation. His appointment as Senior Managing Director further solidifies his reputation as a visionary leader, capable of guiding investments and fostering growth in cutting-edge startups.

a_15.text:
Managing Director
        Neil Sadaranganey

tag_to_content.p_2:
Managing Director
Neil leads the team responsible for investments and business development. Neil focuses on stage agnostic investments in cloud, IOT, and e-commerce. Neil led Docomo’s investments in Centrify, Muzy, Nextbit, Anfacto, Influitive and Nok Nok Labs. His current investments also include Couchbase, Radar, and Zippin. He was also involved in Docomo’s prior investment in Mist Systems which was acquired by Juniper and Coinbase which completed a significant IPO in 2021.
 Prior to Docomo, Neil spent 6 years building Bay Partners Software as a Service and digital media practices. As a General Partner he led the firm’s early investments in Eloqua which was acquired by Oracle after going public in 2012 and Cornerstone onDemand another IPO. Cornerstone (CSOD) is the leader and most valuable company in the talent management space. Neil served as a board director for Cornerstone onDemand, Like.com (acquired by Google), Eventful (acquired by CBS), LiveMedia and Hiplogic (acquired by Zynga).
 Before venture capital, Neil spent 10 years as a product executive in technology companies of all sizes. Neil was part of the founding team of Afara Websystems which was acquired by Sun Microsystems. Afara's technology is the foundation of a multi-billion server product line at Oracle. Neil led product teams at Good Technology, RealNetworks and Sun Microsystems where he launched several new products. He began his career as a consultant with Accenture and IBM.
 Neil has a BS in Systems Engineering from the University of Waterloo and an MBA from Stanford University.
tag_to_content.p_3:
Director
Takashi Kadota, who currently serves as a Director of NTT DOCOMO Ventures Silicon Valley branch, has various experiences like business and service development, network optimization, and sales for both consumer and enterprise after joining NTT DOCOMO.
He also has strengths on building a relationship with global partners, through his proven contribution to several global projects such as i-mode global expansion, Facebook strategic alliance, and Magic Leap capital investment.
tag_to_content.p_4:
Director
Christopher is a venture capital professional focused on investments in B2B, intelligent systems, big data, IoT and other related areas. He brings a mix of banking, venture capital, and operational experience working at several early-stage technology companies. Chris has spent his entire career in the venture capital ecosystem and has experience sourcing and evaluating investments in companies and funds, and in managing transactions and business development initiatives.
Chris started his career managing investments in venture capital and private equity for 
Limited Partners like CalPERS and Oak Hill, and worked as a placement agent and secondary market advisor at Probitas Partners (closed $340m in secondary transactions and raised several funds for top-tier VCs). Chris was later a Co-founder and CEO of an enterprise communication and intelligent systems startup, and worked for several VC-backed, Y-Combinator and TechStars companies in Business Development, Sales and Product Strategy. He also worked at Morgan Stanley and Xpert Financial, sourcing and evaluating numerous technology companies for investment.
Chris has a BA in Economics and International Relations from the University of California, Davis and a certificate from the National University of Singapore in East Asian Economic Studies.
tag_to_content.p_5:
Manager
Yurie is responsible for investments and business development in VR/XR, AI, workinnovation and entertainment.
She has nearly 10 years of experience in planning AI/chatbot/IoT/fintech consumer services from PoC to launch.
Prior to becoming an investor in the Bay Area, She was a product leader on a big 100+ person project where She planned and developed AI/chatbot services while collaborating with the planning and development teams. She had over 10 million users and were featured in the media and on television.
She also planned PFM and IoT services, which received media coverage and other attention.
Prior to that, she was a mobile application related to customer support and won a departmental award for increasing the number of users sevenfold.
She has worked as a planning specialist in various areas of services.
Yurie has a master's degree in Informatics from Tokyo Denki University.
tag_to_content.p_6:
Manager
Masahiro Inoue is a Manager on the Business Development & Investment team in Silicon Valley Branch. He started his career as an AI software engineer in DOCOMO R&D and built a proactive support system based on Natural Language processing. Then he worked for Evernote corporation in Silicon Valley as a Marketing Data Analyst/Partnership&Community marketer. After one year of experience in Evernote, he joined us to help startup growth from his background knowledge and empowered the Japanese startup ecosystem by collaborating with startup ecosystem stakeholders. He also worked for a startup as a data analyst in parallel. He is now engaged in creating business collaboration with startups in the U.S and NTT Gr, and investing startups.

＜Current business＞
・ Creation of collaboration between startups and NTT Group
・ Startup investment
tag_to_content.p_7:
Manager
Harue joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures from April 2024.
She started her carrier in enterprise sales promotion of ICT solutions using innovative technology such as 5G and XR. Then, she engaged in global business restructuring, including stock transfer and reorganization. She also worked for corporate governance and investment management of global portfolio companies.
tag_to_content.p_8:
CEO
Jun Yasumoto joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc. in 2023 as President & CEO.
Since joining Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corporation (NTT) in 1999, he was in charge of solution sales for corporate businesses for two years. Then, he was involved in the planning and development of Internet services, and the start-up for new businesses for 10 years. Since 2018, he was in charge of new business planning and development mainly in the sports and entertainment fields at NTT DOCOMO.
tag_to_content.p_9:
Investment Managing Director
He has an extensive track record of IPOs and M&A exits, while also specializing in investments with business alliances.
He has been in the VC industry for about 20 years and has invested in nearly 30 venture companies.
After that, he was in charge of new business and e-commerce business of Aeon Retail, where he reformed the business, and became Managing Director of NTT DOCOMO Ventures in June 2023.
tag_to_content.p_10:
Investment Director
Daichi joined NTT DOCOMO in 2010, and he has engaged in the development of voice solutions, medical / nursing care solutions.In 2016, he was seconded to the Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry. Returned to NTT DoCoMo in 2018, he has promoted measures for formulating medium-term business plans and realizing medium-term strategies in the Corporate Planning Department. He joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures in July 2021.
tag_to_content.p_11:
Investment Director
Miwa joined Docomo Ventures from August 2022. She is responsible for business management and fund management of DOCOMO Ventures.

Miwa joined NTT DOCOMO after graduating from 2008 in Japan and experienced in sales support operations for DOCOMO Shops. Her next post was in Global Business Department and she worked for about 11 years, mainly in charge of business management of DOCOMO subsidiaries in Europe, US, and Asia. She gained financial experience through a secondment to a subsidiary based in Italy. After returning to Japan, she was in charge of planning strategies for overseas subsidiaries.
Miwa holds an MBA from Graduate School of Management, GLOBIS University (2022).
tag_to_content.p_12:
Investment Director
As a one of founding members of NTT Docomo Ventures (formerly NTT Investment Partners) since 2008, he was consistently involved in NTT's corporate venture capital activities. He led many investments in Israel, South East Asia, Europe, and Japan such as Riskified, Otonomo, and Wiliot. He helped these companies with their Japan market entry, and has built and facilitated the relationships between the portfolio startups and the NTT group.  He has also handled all of front, middle, and back office operations for the organization, such as fund management and exit strategies. Currently he is exploring the next promising areas of technology and sustainability in Israel and Europe.
tag_to_content.p_13:
Investment Director
Yuma Kotake, just joined NDV in 2023, is responsible for investment and supports start-ups and portfolio companies in interaction with NTT Groups. 

He has more than 10 years of experience as in-house lawyer in NTT DOCOMO and dealt with various domestic/cross border M&A and other strategic alliance. 

Prior to joining NDV, he was the General Manager of Business Planning Dept of DOCOMO Insight Marketing Inc. in charge of business strategy and development since 2021.

He loves classic hard rock and heavy metal, such as Gun N Roses, Bon Jovi, Van Halen, MÖTLEY CRÜE. His interest in international business and the English language actually developed as a result of the passion for them. 

Attorney at Law, N.Y. 
University of Pennsylvania Law School, LL.M. class of 2014
Wharton Business & Law Certificate, 2014
tag_to_content.p_14:
Investment Director
Yuko Sakamoto joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures in April 2024. 
Before joining NDV, she worked at NTT DATA, where she engaged in data center and cloud computing platform business.
Subsequently, she worked as a pre-sales manager, engaged in low-code platform and process mining business.
tag_to_content.p_15:
Investment Manager
Yasutaka Imai is an Investment Manager at NTT DOCOMO Ventures, where he spearheads the creation of collaborations between startups and NTT Group.
Since joining NTT DOCOMO, INC in 2013, he served in the field of Corporate Communications as a PR Planner, where he was responsible for developing and executing external communication strategies for both Japanese and foreign media in areas such as business strategy, investment collaboration, new ventures, and advanced technologies. From 2016, he worked on a project for MWC Barcelona, the world's largest mobile-related exhibition, taking the lead to showcase DOCOMO’s technologies and global businesses.
tag_to_content.p_16:
Investment Manager
Joined a local bank and mainly engaged in corporate sales. In 2016, he was seconded to a regional bank-based VC and was in charge of startup investment. Later, with the establishment of the group's specialized investment subsidiary, he engaged in a wide range of fund operations, including buyout investment and fund raising, from the time of its establishment. To date, he has invested in more than 20 companies in a wide range of stages from startup to pre-IPO round. Participated in NTT Docomo Ventures from October 2023.
tag_to_content.p_17:
Investment Manager
Tomohiro joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures in April 2018. Prior to NDV, he worked for NTT Communications, where he engaged in streaming sevice platform.
tag_to_content.p_18:
Investment Manager
After joining NTT docomo, Yoshiaki engaged in mobile network infrastructure business, and ,made a traffic model that is the source of network infrastructure investment of hundreds of billions a year.
After that, he worked on internet services in the early days of smartphones, and was seconded to Rakuten.
He engaged in service planning and operation of Web and applications, and in charge of services of various forms (subscription, commerce, B2C, C2C, etc..) and genres (information distribution, agent service, auction, shopping, fashion, travel, etc..) , and he also serves as an outside lecturer.
He is currently committed to using these experiences to create innovation at startups and the NTT Group.

＜Current business＞
・ Planning and operation of Docomo Ventures event
・ Planning and operation of SNS (TW, FB, note)
・ Creation of collaboration between startups and NTT Group
・ Startup investment
tag_to_content.p_19:
Investment Manager
Taiki joined NTT DOCOMO, INC after graduating from Tokyo Institute of Technology Graduate School of Management of Technology. After joining the company, he engaged in sales consulting for DOCOMO Shops. He later engaged in formulating medium-term strategies for the mobile communications business and launching new alliance services at the Marketing Department. He joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures in April 2021 and has been in charge of investment in startups, creation of business collaboration and company management.
tag_to_content.p_20:
Co-Creation Director
Atsushi joined Docomo Ventures in September 2022. He is responsible for promoting collaboration between startups and NTT Group companies and supporting business development.

He started his career as a Software Engineer at NTT Internet and was engaged in the development of payment systems. At Future Architect, he was engaged in BPR projects as an IT consultant.

After that, he became a Digital Marketing Consultant. At Dentsu Digital (formerly Dentsu e-Marketing One) and Accenture, he was engaged in various projects such as marketing strategy formulation, new service planning, web/smartphone application development, campaign planning, marketing research, sales/marketing solution implementation, and promotion of open innovation activities between startups and client companies.

He later became engaged in new business development support. He worked for BCG Digital Ventures, an incubation firm, and Archetype, where he worked on various new business development projects for large companies.
tag_to_content.p_21:
Co-Creation Manager
Akiko is responsible for developing collaboration businesses between startups and NTT groups, especially with NTT Communications.

Akiko started her career as a network Engineer at NTT Communications.
She worked in the incubation development of Network Services and experience a development of Layer 2 and 3.
She joined the trainee program in 2016 and worked in Singapore as a network engineer.
After coming back to Japan, she was in the team of collaboration with NTT Communications and startups.
She was in charge of PoC support and pitch event, Meet Silicon Valley in Tokyo.
She joined NTT DOCOMO Ventures in July 2022.

tag_to_content.title: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in Mint Town, Co., Ltd., a Company Aiming to Provide a web3 Gaming Platform through its Reward Point Collection Service “Mint Town” | NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.h1_0: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in Mint Town, Co., Ltd., a Company Aiming to Provide a web3 Gaming Platform through its Reward Point Collection Service “Mint Town”
tag_to_content.p_2: NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc. (Head Office: Minato-ku, Tokyo; President and CEO: Jun Yasumoto; hereinafter, “NDV”) is pleased to announce that, through a fund that it manages, it has invested in Mint Town, Co., Ltd. (Head Office: Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Hironao Kunimitsu ), a company handling web3 games and platform business.
tag_to_content.p_3: Mint Town, Co., Ltd. is a startup led by Hironao Kunimitsu, founder of gumi, and was established in May 2023 through a corporate spin-off from Thirdverse, Co., Ltd. In addition to operating the web3 game “Captain Tsubasa -RIVALS-” jointly developed with BLOCKSMITH&Co. and developing several web3 games, the company is planning the global rollout of “Mint Town”*1, a new type of reward point collection service that allows players to earn points by playing free games. The company aims to turn Mint Town, its reward point collection service, into a web3 gaming platform in the future, and is looking into issuing its own wallets and tokens. Development is currently underway with a view to releasing the service this spring.
tag_to_content.p_4: The NTT DOCOMO Group is promoting initiatives to accelerate the spread and implementation of web3 in our society. The investment was made with an eye toward popularizing web3, in the hope of creating future business synergies between the DOCOMO Group and the company, which has a wealth of experience in the development and operation of web3 games and platforms.
tag_to_content.p_5:
*1 Based on the concept of “enriching people’s lives through games,” this new type of reward point collection service allows users to enjoy earning points and to increase them all at once by playing free games. In addition to what is possible with existing reward point collection services, users can use the points they have earned to play games within the service and increase their points to a maximum of 1 million yen**  by winning. In addition, users will not only be able to connect with other users through the Circle function within the service, but also to collect points together with their Circle friends.
**Points within the service equivalent to 1 million yen.
tag_to_content.p_6:
■Mint Town Co., Ltd. Profile
Name: Mint Town Co., Ltd.
Head Office: WeWork, 11F KANDA SQUARE, 2-2-1 Kanda Nishiki-cho, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo
Representative: CEO Hironao Kunimitsu
Areas of Business: Planning, development, sales and operation of web3 games and platforms
Website: https://minttown.jp/

tag_to_content.title: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in AI model Inc., which Supports Digital Transformation through the Generation of AI Models and Personalities | NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.h1_0: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in AI model Inc., which Supports Digital Transformation through the Generation of AI Models and Personalities
tag_to_content.p_2: NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc. (Head Office: Minato-ku, Tokyo; President  and CEO: Jun Yasumoto; hereinafter, “NDV”) is pleased to announce that, through a fund that it manages, it has invested in AI model Inc.  (Head office: Shibuya-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director: Daiki  Taniguchi), which supports digital transformation through the generation of AI models and personalities.
tag_to_content.p_3: The AI models and personalities developed by AI model Inc. are services that generate original models exclusively for individual companies, enabling them to optimize their branding and promotions. When deploying TV commercials, key visuals for advertisements, and e-commerce sites, the models and the quality of the photography have a significant impact on consumers’ purchasing decisions. By using AI to generate the models and personalities that are vital in creating a brand’s outlook, AI model Inc. is bringing digital transformation to the industry.
tag_to_content.p_4: By providing this platform widely to apparel companies, advertising agencies, production companies, e-commerce site operators, modeling agencies, and photography production companies in Japan and abroad, the company aims to solve issues in model photography, broaden the horizons of creativity, and contribute to the development of a variety of industries.
tag_to_content.p_5: NDV’s investment policy, announced in October 2023, calls for ”evolving into a CVC that pursues more strategic returns,” and as such, we are increasing our investment share in companies that offer prospects for co-creation, as well as strengthening our investments in lead positions. This investment in AI model Inc. is the first lead investment in Japanese startups, and with this investment, we will provide strong support for the company’s growth. We also aim to create new value through co-creation with fashion services and advertising services offered by the NTT DOCOMO Group.
tag_to_content.p_6:
■AI model Inc. Profile
Name: AI model Inc.
Head Office: 4-1-8 Sendagaya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Representative: Daiki Taniguchi
Areas of Business: Supporting digital transformation through the generation of AI models and personalities using AI technology
Website: https://ai-model.jp/

tag_to_content.title: Mission / Vision | NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.p_0:
Our Mission
Transform the global landscapeby uniting talent and visions.
tag_to_content.p_1: At NTT DOCOMO Ventures, we unite your vision with the NTT Group’s proven deployment expertise to create a better future. Together we can make a huge impact and  transform the global landscape.
tag_to_content.h2_0: Uniting Startups and the NTT Group
tag_to_content.p_2: Uniting the business and technology needs of NTT Group companies with start-ups and investors yields outsized impact and growth – uniting vision and talent is a driving force for the future.

img_4.alt: Uniting Startups and the NTT Group. Uniting the business and technology needs of NTT Group companies with start-ups and investors yields outsized impact and growth – uniting vision and talent is a driving force for the future.

tag_to_content.p_3:
Our Vision
With all the talents and enthusiasms necessary to change the world,we get together and unite at our dynamic global corporate venture capital.
tag_to_content.p_4:
The NTT Group transforms the global landscape with its preeminent technological skills and proven deployment capabilities.
			Startups plant the budding trees of change with their innovations and talent, enabling them to freely conceptualize and execute decisively.
			 At NTT DOCOMO Ventures, we link your visionary concepts with the NTT Group’s decisive deployment expertise.
			 Our mission is to unite startups and the NTT Group - empowering our united talent and passion.
			 By joining together your ambitions and our aspirations, we will create a new driving force towards the future and making the world-changing impacts that we have never seen before.
			With our dynamic global venture capital firm, we aspire to bring together all the talent and ambitions necessary to lead this global transformation and change the world for the better.
tag_to_content.p_5: NTT DOCOMO Ventures leverages the global assets of NTT Group, NTT Docomo and our team based in Tokyo and Silicon Valley, investing in cutting-edge technologies and companies around the world.

img_5.alt: Uniting Globally. NTT DOCOMO Ventures leverages the global assets of NTT Group, NTT Docomo and our team based in Tokyo and Silicon Valley, investing in cutting-edge technologies and companies around the world.

tag_to_content.title: 株式会社NTTドコモ・ベンチャーズ

img_1.alt: 株式会社NTTドコモ・ベンチャーズ

a_15.text: Activities

tag_to_content.span_1: Event
tag_to_content.p_1:
Our Mission
力と想いを束ね、世界の景色を変える。
tag_to_content.p_2: 私たちNTTドコモ・ベンチャーズは、スタートアップの構想実行力とNTTグループの社会実装力、さらにそれぞれの想いを束ねることで、未来への推進力を生み出します。そして、世界の景色を変えるインパクトを起こしていきます。
tag_to_content.p_3:
Our Vision
世界の景色を変える力と想いが、世界中から集まるコーポレートベンチャーキャピタルへ。
tag_to_content.p_4:
NTTグループは、今まで、その技術力と社会実装力で、世界の景色を変えてきました。一方で、スタートアップは、その自由な構想力と技術や人による実行力で、変化の芽を生み出し続けています。
                    私たちNTTドコモ・ベンチャーズは、スタートアップの構想実行力とNTTグループの社会実装力をつなぎます。
                    私たちのつなぎかた、それはスタートアップとNTTグループ、それぞれの力と想いを束ねること。
                    それぞれの想いに寄り添いながら、そして私たちの想いも乗せ、束ねることで、未来への推進力を生み出し、世界の景色を変える今までなかったインパクトを起こします。
                    そして、世界の景色を変える力と想いが、世界中から集まるコーポレートベンチャーキャピタルへ。
tag_to_content.p_5:
Our Function
共創サポート
tag_to_content.p_6: NTTグループのスタートアップ連携窓口として各社の事業やニーズにマッチする企業をつなげて連携を支援しています。

img_6.alt: NTTグループのスタートアップ連携窓口として各社の事業やニーズにマッチする企業をつなげて連携を支援しています。

img_7.alt: NTTグループのスタートアップ連携窓口として各社の事業やニーズにマッチする企業をつなげて連携を支援しています。

tag_to_content.p_7:
Our Function
スタートアップ投資
tag_to_content.p_8: 10年以上にわたり、コーポレートベンチャーファンドを運営し、世界の先端企業に投資を行っています。

img_8.alt: 国内最大級のコーポレートベンチャーファンドを運営し、10年以上にわたり世界の先端企業に投資を行っています。

img_9.alt: 国内最大級のコーポレートベンチャーファンドを運営し、10年以上にわたり世界の先端企業に投資を行っています。

tag_to_content.title: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in Parallel Inc., a Provider of a Hangout App for Having Fun with Friends | NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc.
tag_to_content.h1_0: NTT DOCOMO Ventures Invests in Parallel Inc., a Provider of a Hangout App for Having Fun with Friends
tag_to_content.p_2: NTT DOCOMO Ventures, Inc. (Head Office: Minato-ku, Tokyo; President and CEO: Jun Yasumoto; hereinafter, “NDV”) is pleased to announce that, through a fund that it manages, it has invested in Parallel Inc. (Head Office: Minato-ku, Tokyo; Representative Directors: Jo Aoki and Taiki Toshihara), the provider of “Parallel ,” a hangout app that allows users to have fun with their friends.
tag_to_content.p_3: Parallel is an “online hangout” where users can enjoy games, videos, music, and other content with their friends, providing an online space similar to playing at a friend’s house or in a classroom after school. As of December 2023, it has a cumulative total of over 4 million registered users, of which more than 70% are Gen Z (aged 13–27), showing that it is gaining significant support from the younger generation. Furthermore, the average time spent talking with friends within the app exceeds 180 minutes per day, creating a new form of online communication.
tag_to_content.p_4:
In its investment policy announced in October 2023, NDV identified entertainment as one of the priority investment areas for the DOCOMO Innovation Fund. This investment in Parallel Inc. is the fund’s largest ever investment in a startup, and exemplifies the strengthening of the fund’s investments in the field of entertainment.
Moreover, the NTT DOCOMO Group is also building a stronger presence in the content and entertainment industries with its Smart Life Business. With this investment, Parallel Inc., which provides a community where people can enjoy various entertainment content with their friends, and the NTT DOCOMO Group will collaborate more closely to create new value and a new culture of communication.
tag_to_content.p_5:
■Parallel Inc. Profile
Name: Parallel Inc.
Head Office: 101 Keyaki House, 3-19-10 Nishiazabu, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Representatives: Jo Aoki and Taiki Toshihara
Areas of Business: Planning, development and operation of “Parallel,” a hangout app for having fun with friends
Website: https://www.parallelcorp.com/
